EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
VESSEL, 180 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED
OF ASSISTANCE IN 34-51.35N 012-11.23E
AT 280705Z MAR. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4527 OR 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 03 906 592 2737 OR 3906 5908 4791,
E-MAIL: UFFICIO3.REPARTO3@MIT.GOV.IT.
